reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an excellent professor who explains complex topics clearly. His lectures are engaging, and he's always willing to help students during office hours.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is a knowledgeable and patient instructor. The course material is challenging, but she makes it manageable. Her exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown knows his stuff, but his teaching style can be a bit dry. It's easy to fall behind if you're not paying attention. The labs were helpful, though.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Green is passionate about literature and it shows in her teaching. Her classes are thought-provoking and she encourages deep analysis of the texts.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are hard to follow, and the material is not well-organized. He seems knowledgeable, but I struggled to keep up with the course.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Miller's class is challenging but rewarding. She provides real-world examples that make the concepts easier to understand.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a decent lecturer, but his lectures can be a bit monotonous. The course content is interesting, though.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is a fantastic professor who genuinely cares about her students. Her lectures are clear, and she makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is very knowledgeable and presents history in an engaging way. His exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are hard to follow, and the material can be confusing. I had a tough time with this course.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is a good professor, but his lectures can be a bit dry. The material is challenging, but his office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is an engaging lecturer who encourages class discussions. Her assignments are thought-provoking and relevant.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is passionate about the environment and it shows in his teaching. His classes are informative and inspiring.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is an inspiring professor who encourages creativity. Her feedback is constructive, and she creates a supportive classroom environment.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit hard to follow. The course material is interesting but challenging.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. King is an excellent professor who makes complex economic concepts easy to understand. Her lectures are clear and engaging.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Dr. Wright is a great professor who explains difficult concepts well. His exams are tough, but he prepares students well.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is passionate about art and it shows in her teaching. Her classes are interesting, and she encourages students to think critically about art.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be a bit dry. The course material is interesting, but the exams are challenging.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 101
reviews.review: Dr. White is an excellent professor who explains chemistry concepts clearly. Her labs are well-organized, and she's always willing to help students.
